LanguageData.SimpleRib.label: blank rib replacement
LanguageData.SimpleRib.description: A hollow artificial rib, with a tiny dispenser system. Ready to be filled to complete a rib replacement implant of choice.
LanguageData.MedicalRib.label: medical rib replacement
LanguageData.MedicalRib.description: An artificial rib, equipped with little blood filters and antibiotics-dispensers to keep the user healthy.
LanguageData.DruggedRib.label: drugged rib replacement
LanguageData.DruggedRib.description: An artificial rib, equipped with little flake-dispensers to keep the user happy. Synthetic liver highly recommended.
LanguageData.AdrenalineRib.label: adrenaline rib replacement
LanguageData.AdrenalineRib.description: An artificial rib, equipped with little adrenaline-dispensers to keep the user fit and awake.
LanguageData.PainkillerRib.label: painkiller rib replacement
LanguageData.PainkillerRib.description: An artificial rib, equipped with little morphine-dispensers to numb the user's pain. Side effects are respiratory ailments.
LanguageData.HeaterRib.label: heating rib replacement
LanguageData.HeaterRib.description: An artificial rib, containing a micro-reactor powered, heat inducing spiral to warm the body from the inside.
LanguageData.CoolerRib.label: cooling rib replacement
LanguageData.CoolerRib.description: An artificial rib with a micro coolant system, increasing the effectiveness of heat exchange via dermal exhausts.
